about_the_game:
Salmon Man is not a game; it's an experience, a test, a gift... to be sent to a certain kind of person, the one you hate from the deepest part of your soul.

Challenge your skills, your patience, and your sanity. Fulfill your dream by following your salmon friend and climbing up that river until the great illumination! But don't expect pity, or even saves.

In Salmon Man, there are no shortcuts, no cheat codes, no easy way out... Or maybe there are? Who knows? I do, but I won't tell you. Try to find out for yourself if you want to waste some time, or not, or maybe you should? Or not?



  • Vr rage game.
  • Climb the world with your paddle by hitting the ground to move forward on this hardcore VR platformer.
  • You hold your paddle with your two controllers.
  • Your paddle can be your best friend and your worst enemy; it helps you climb, but one misplay can push you out of the way.
  • Try it, fail, cry, and retry endlessly.
  • No check point or saves.
  • Avoid traps, challenge your dexterity, and strengthen your mental abilities.
  • Experience emotions you never knew existed while conquering this world.
